== Kodungallur (M + OG) (803281) ==

Kodungallur (M + OG) is a town in the [[Kodungallur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 26.82 sq. km. and harbouring 14835 households with total population of 60190 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 38 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 270 km. Male population is 28452 and female population is 31738. Scheduled Caste population is 4698 and Scheduled Tribes population is 84. Census Location Code of the town is 803281<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class II (population_total 50,000 to 99,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 38 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 40 km. Railway station is at Irinjalakuda at a distance of 22 km.
